resources.string: You see Isolde Thornbrook walk into the tavern. She is a tall human and she is the local potionmaker.

string-array.name: player_isolde
string-array.item: I\'m sorry to hear that, Isolde. Anything specific that happened?
You think that\'s bad? Try dodging fireballs while dealing with unruly patrons. Now that\'s a bad day.
Ah, the universe must\'ve conspired to give you a reason to seek solace in the stars tonight. Consider me your celestial remedy for the woes of the day.
Seems like quite the adventurous day! Is dealing with cranky centaurs a regular occurrence around here?
Spilling potions and centaur drama? Sounds like the recipe for a thrilling memoir.
Spilled potion, cranky centaur... Sounds like you needed a bit of magic to turn that day around. Maybe I can offer some enchantment to make it better?
You\'re absolutely right, Isolde. I didn\'t mean to downplay your day. I\'m here to listen if you need to vent about it.
I guess we\'re both having a day, huh? Dodging fireballs or dealing with spilled potions, it\'s all part of the grand adventure.
You\'re absolutely right, Isolde. Empathy is essential. So, how about I make it up to you by being the most empathetic company over a drink tonight?
I\'d be honored to accompany you under the stars, Isolde. There\'s something magical about finding solace amidst the twinkling constellations.
Well, I hope the stars have better luck than I do at preventing spilled potions and cranky centaurs.
Consider me your shooting star tonight, ready to grant any wish you desire under this celestial canopy.

string-array.name: isolde_resp
string-array.item: Oh, you know, the usual. Got caught in a downpour, spilled an entire potion on myself, and then had to deal with a cranky centaur. Just a regular day in my life.
Sure, dodging fireballs must be a real hassle, but it doesn\'t discount the frustration of my day. A little empathy goes a long way, you know.
Well, if you\'re offering such cosmic remedies, I might just have to take you up on that. It\'s a lovely thought, finding solace under the stars with good company. Thank you.
Thankfully not, but today seemed to be their day for causing chaos. I\'ll take a regular day of serving over that any time.
If I ever decide to write one, that would make an interesting chapter. But for now, I\'ll settle for a less dramatic routine, thank you.
If your magic can guarantee no more spilled potions, I might just take you up on that offer. Otherwise, I think I\'ll survive with the chaos of today behind me.
Thanks, I appreciate that. Sometimes just having someone to talk to makes the frustrations easier to handle.
True, it\'s a mad world out there. Let\'s hope our next days involve fewer dramatic incidents, shall we?
Flattery will get you everywhere, but it won\'t erase the chaos of the day. Still, a drink and good company might just be the remedy I need.
Absolutely, the stars have a way of making everything feel a bit lighter, don\'t they?
Maybe we should look for a \'luck\' constellation tonight. It might balance out our chaotic days.
A shooting star, huh? Well, I might have a wish or two in mind, if you\'re up for playing the part.
